name: SynthCity
description:
SynthCity Idle Clicker

is a game of idle clickers familly (Cookie Clicker, Idle World etc.) created in .NET Windows Presentation Foundation. The goal is to earn as much money (Palms) and build as much buildings as possible.

Make your SynthCity growing, invest in new buildings, purchase technologies, find easter eggs, unlock achivements and many more! Any feedback is welcome :)

SynthCity is now in alpha version, the game still needs a lot of changes, adjustments and balance.
Any feedback is welcome, especially about balancing prices and earnings but also about bug's and other suggestions!

Things that will be changed:
-money balance
-achivements graphic design
-technologies graphic design
-add random events (which are still not implemented!)
-the Clicking Area graphics will be changing depends on earnings
-Save/Load the game (which are still not implemented!)
-shower thoughts will be implemented
-I will probably add some information about current PPS and PPC
-"MessageBox" which is currently used in many places (like "achivement unlocked" or "you dont have enough money") will be changed into dedicated WPF window

Short manual:
1) The main currency in SynthCity are "Palms"

2) to collect Palms by clicking you have to click on the biggest graphics at the left

3) PPS mean "Palms Per Second", PPC mean "Palms Per Click"

Planned milestones:

29.04.2019 - playable alpha version
12.05.2019 - open beta version, opinions, suggestions etc. are welcome
30.05.2019 - RC version
05.06.2019 - stable RTM version
